question: World's first mangrove zoo has been proposed to be opened in which state?
explanation: World's first mangrove zoo has been proposed to be opened at Sunderbans in which will house rare and endangered animals of the Sunderbans. The project is estimated to be completed in five years with cost Rs. 25 crore. The move is a bid to conserve the endangered flora and fauna of the Sunderbans, the world's largest mangrove forest.
